parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> A3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.64

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Unit Control

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Forces the vehicle to stay on road.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> vehicle '''forceFollowRoad''' state

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> vehicle: [[Object]] - vehicle

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> state: [[Boolean]] - true: Force on road, false: default behaviour

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>car [[forceFollowRoad]] [[true]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[setConvoySeparation]],[[limitSpeed]], [[setDriveOnPath]]
</value></part></template>

<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template></root>
